channel.title: Http-kernels on SlimFit Documenation
channel.description: Recent content in Http-kernels on SlimFit Documenation

item.title: HTTP Kernel
item.description: HTTP Stack In SlimFit, we have a HTTP Kernel handles request and return a response. That is how a webservice works. HTTP Kernel is a middlewares stack, where each middleware receive a request, process the request or pass it to next middleware, and finally return a response. Note Below part of document has been copied from Slim Framework docs, and I changed some place to fit with SlimFit. What is middleware?
